plugin-data.name: Hero Banner
plugin-data.description: Display a hero banner on any Bludit CMS theme homepage.

hero-bg-color: Set Hero Banner primary background color.
hero-title: Set a heading title for your Hero Banner.
hero-title-color: Set the color of heading title for your Hero Banner.
hero-phrase: Set a phrase or short message for your Hero Banner.
hero-phrase-color: Set the color of phrase or short message for your Hero Banner.
hero-button-link: Url link for the hero button to your content or external link.
